message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay up to $1000000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my initial price. I'm willing to come down to $1100000. This is a significant reduction, and I believe it still reflects the value the product holds for you. Let's see if we can make this work.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $1050000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value while allowing me to stay within my financial limits.
